lead_paragraph: Chelsea plans to invite a black man abused by its supporters at a Paris subway station this week to its London stadium for the return leg of the team’s Champions League match against Paris St.-Germain.

headline.main: Chelsea to Send Invitation to Man Abused by Its Fans
headline.print_headline: Chelsea to Send Invitation To Man Abused by Its Fans

snippet: Chelsea plans to invite a black man abused by its supporters at a Paris subway station this week to its London stadium for the return leg of the team’s Champions League match against Paris St.-Germain.
